name: Wind Chime
description:
Someone is falling asleep, listening to their wind chimes. You are the wind, listening to their thoughts…

There are 4 endings. Try to find them all. Each playthrough takes at most 1 minute.

Controls

Click or touch anywhere, or press any key.

In the main menu: Tap to move between options. Hold to select an option.

In game: Tap to ring the wind chimes.

Made for 1-button jam.
